build.buildCommand: pip install -r requirements.txt && python manage.py collectstatic --noinput

deploy.startCommand: sh -c 'python manage.py migrate && gunicorn --bind 0.0.0.0:8000 --workers 3 --timeout 120 --access-logfile - --error-logfile - --log-level debug --capture-output --enable-stdio-inheritance --forwarded-allow-ips="*" garaad.wsgi:application'
